      • resolveLocalPath

        public Path resolveLocalPath(String commandPath)
                      throws IOException,
                             InvalidPathException
        Parameters:
        commandPath - The command path using the local file separator
        Returns:
        The resolved absolute and normalized local path Path
        Throws:
        IOException - If failed to resolve the path
        InvalidPathException - If invalid local path value
